xml.p: Mon4: "I've learned a lot from my parrot family...#$b#But I'm sure there's a lot more out there I don't know.$s" #!String
Tue: "When Sun is angry, it feels good in the jungle.#$e#Sun can't find us beneath the leaves. We trick him! Haha...$h" #!String
Wed2: "Be careful in the volcano... the spirits don't like outsiders." #!String
Thu: "Have you met the others like you?#$b#I don't talk to them much. I feel safer with my own kind...$3" #!String
Fri: "One time... I was at the top of the volcano at night, and I saw lights far, far away.#$b#I wonder if there are other bird families out there?$3" #!String
Fri3: "I wonder if I could see your home from the top of the volcano?" #!String
Sat: "...I'm sad today.$s#$e#You go on... have fun. Let me be sad.$s" #!String
Sun: "When it rains, strange birds visit.#$b#I try to speak to them... but they fly away.$s#$b#I guess they don't want to be friends...$s" #!String
